915180.name: Sokoban: The RPG - Soundtrack
915180.description:
This DLC contains the full original soundtrack from the game Sokoban: The RPG in high quality.
Featuring all 26 instrumental music tracks from the game, comprising over 82 minutes, in 320kpbs mp3 files!

It will support the developer who did not only put his heart and soul into making the game, but also into creating this full original soundtrack to complete the experience.
It is truly highly appreciated - I hope you will like them as much as I do!

Tracklist in alphabetical order:
01. 24-7 (5:50)
02. Afterglow (3:31)
03. Anniversary (2:59)
04. Counting Down (4:13)
05. Drained Well (4:52)
06. Embarrassing questions (2:40)
07. Episode S (3:07)
08. Essence (2:21)
09. Flash (3:20)
10. Impurity (2:54)
11. In conclusion (2:02)
12. Injustice (1:31)
13. Layers of Suicide (4:16)
14. Life is strange unplugged (2:28)
15. Lucid ii (2:04)
16. Malfunction (2:52)
17. On the verge (2:52)
18. Out in the open (4:56)
19. Puzzle (0:52)
20. Quality Content (3:44)
21. Streetlights (5:58)
22. Train Girl (3:12)
23. Trust (1:56)
24. View from nowhere (2:41)
25. Welcome (3:14)
26. White (2:05)
915180.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
